summary: Adds carvings and statues of the Divines and Daedric Princes to find in-game!
descriptionHtml:
Adds carvings and statues of the Divines and Daedric Princes to find in-game!

You can scale up any item by clicking it and typing 'setscale 1.00' into console.

The textures are self-made upgrades to the default statues, with either wood grain (taken from the Skyrim crate texture) or stone (another Skyrim texture) blended on top. These textures appear only on the custom items, and do not replace or require the other statues' textures seen in-game.
author: TwinCrows
